description: Weaver Leather Synergy Flex Contour Performance Saddle Pad The Synergy Flex Contour Performance Saddle Pad was specifically designed to fit your horse's back. The durable design features a tightly-woven, rugged 100% wool topper and premium wear leathers that are made to last. The moisture-wicking wool liner naturally pulls sweat away from your horse's back for even cooling. Ventilated and lightweight EVA sport foam maximizes airflow for cool performance, and rebounds quickly while offering impact-absorbing protection.
